item.title: Natsume’s Book of Friends: Hazuki no Shirushi game announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/natsumes-book-of-friends-hazuki-no-shirushi-game-announced

Details to come on December 23.

The Natsume‘s Book of Friends Production Committee has announced Natsume’s Book of Friends: Hazuki no Shirushi, the first-ever game based on the long-running manga series.

Details such as publisher, developer, game contents, and platforms were not announced, but further information will be shared on December 23 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET / 25:00 JST.
